DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if a protective ventilatory strategy during one-lung ventilation (OLV) could reduce postoperative complications after thoracotomies or thoracoscopic pulmonary resection. Primary endpoint: Evaluation of Acute Lung Injury (ALI) incidence Secondary endpoint: postoperative outcome (hospital stay, morbidity, mortality and their correlation with preoperative comorbidity and surgery technique.
DOC.brief_title: Protective Versus Conventional Ventilation During Thoracic Surgery
